Lucky me, look at me look at what I'm dripping with.... Little girls







----- Original Message ----
From: Anne Marie <amshot@...>
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Friday, August 29, 2008 4:52:21 PM
Subject: [unschoolingbasics] OT: poll


In the Costco Connection Magazine they have a poll going asking
"Should parents be certified to Homeschool their children?". Well I
thought people might want to give their opinion.

Anne Marie

messages.subject: Re: OT: poll
messages.msgSnippet: I don t think so.  For most of the history of our country parents taught their children.
messages.messageBody:
I don't think so. For most of the history of our country parents
taught their children.
